pages.name: Home
pages.description: The main entry point of the website, showcasing the store's best features and promotions.

sections.name: Navbar
sections.description: Provides navigation links to other pages on the website.

sections.description: Displays a prominent banner or slideshow highlighting the store's latest collections or deals.

sections.description: Gives a brief overview of the store's history, mission, and values.

sections.name: Footer
